plot: A woman is drowning in loneliness, with the absence of her military spouse. Living her everyday life in an isolated town in the south, she comes across a moral dilemma that she must choose to resolve.
title: The Deployed Spouse
plot_es: A woman is drowning in loneliness, with the absence of her military spouse. Living her everyday life in an isolated town in the south, she comes across a moral dilemma that she must choose to resolve.
plot_en: A woman is drowning in loneliness, with the absence of her military spouse. Living her everyday life in an isolated town in the south, she comes across a moral dilemma that she must choose to resolve.
